body:
Yup this came also from the ocn!

I am here to show you the translator badge!


We Need guys who can translate the plugins with crowdin so other players from europe or whatever can play the server!




Image here http://imgur.com/BayaTW6


Also here is how the translators account will look like with the badge http://imgur.com/lwlRNWJ

title: Suggestion The Translator Badge

replies.body:
"Thanks to everyone that is offering help, but I talked with kylo about the translation project and crowdin wants a monthly fee for its service. Well, the service wasn't being utilized, so it got canceled.
I also talked about future plans/translation projects, but there aren't any yet." - me about 17 hours ago
